author: Caledonia Wright
description: On the sour/dry side, this aperitif-style cocktail combines bittersweet amaro and gentian with Canadian rye whisky and citrus sourness.
name: Canadian Tuxedo
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably chunk of block ice)
